import React,{useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import swal from 'sweetalert'; import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom'; const UpdateFacture = () => { const [factureInput,setFacture] = useState([]); const [error,setError] = useState([]); let history = useHistory(); const handleInput = (e) => { e.persist(); setFacture({...factureInput, [e.target.name] : e.target.value }); } return(

Update Facture


FullName : {error.name}
C I N : {error.cin}
Subscribe Price : {error.subscribe}
Member ID : {error.member_id}
Date Payment : {error.date_payment}
Etat : {error.etat}

); } export default UpdateFacture;
